remarks: Closure of a group homomorphism.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 3-Mar-2008.)
statement:
ghomfo.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
ghomfo.2 $e |- Y = ran F $.
ghomfo.3 $e |- S = ( H |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
ghomfo.4 $e |- Z = ran S $.
ghomcl $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> ( A e. X -> ( F ` A ) e. Z ) ) $.
